alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Bourbon (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 03 at 5:37PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of EAST CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, Anderson, Bourbon, Clark, Fayette, Franklin, Garrard, Harrison, Jessamine, Madison, Mercer, Nicholas, Scott and Woodford. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 534 PM EST, emergency management reported minor flooding caused by ongoing light to moderate rains today. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lexington, Richmond, Georgetown, Frankfort, Nicholasville, Winchester, Lawrenceburg, Versailles, Paris and Harrodsburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
